de.ad.sudoku

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ad.sudoku.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Sudoku Grid consisting of a 9x9 matrix containing nine 3x3 sub-grids of Grid.Cells.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Grid.Cell
      This class represents a Cell within a Sudoku Grid.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static Grid of(int[][] grid)
        A static factory method which returns a Grid of a given two-dimensional array of integers.
        Parameters:
        grid - a two-dimensional int-array representation of a Grid
        Returns:
        a Grid instance corresponding to the provided two-dimensional int-array

      • emptyGrid

        public static Grid emptyGrid()
        A static factory method which returns an empty Grid.
        Returns:
        an empty Grid

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of this Grid. This method is useful if you want to iterate over all Grid.Cells.

        To access one cell use getCell(int, int).

        Note: This is the size of one dimension. This Grid contains size x size Grid.Cells.
        Returns:
        the size of this Grid

      • getCell

        public Grid.Cell getCell(int row,
                         int column)
        Returns the Grid.Cell at the given position within the Grid.

        This Grid has 0 to getSize() rows and 0 to getSize() columns.
        Parameters:
        row - the row which contains the Grid.Cell
        column - the column which contains the Grid.Cell
        Returns:
        the Grid.Cell at the given position

      • isValidValueForCell

        public boolean isValidValueForCell(Grid.Cell cell,
                                   int value)
        Checks if a given value is valid for a certain Grid.Cell.

        A value is valid if it does not already exist in the same row, column and box.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Grid.Cell to check
        value - the value to validate
        Returns:
        true if the given value is valid or false otherwise

      • getFirstEmptyCell

        public java.util.Optional<Grid.Cell> getFirstEmptyCell()
        Returns the first empty Grid.Cell of this Grid.

        Note: The result is wrapped by an Optional.
        Returns:
        a non-null value containing the first empty Grid.Cell if present

      • getNextEmptyCellOf

        public java.util.Optional<Grid.Cell> getNextEmptyCellOf(Grid.Cell cell)
        Returns the next empty Grid.Cell consecutively to the given Grid.Cell in this Grid.

        Note: The result is wrapped by an Optional.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Grid.Cell of which the next empty Grid.Cell should be obtained
        Returns:
        a non-null value containing the next empty Grid.Cell if present

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of this Grid.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of this Grid.
